titleStmt.title: The bottomles pit smoaking in familisme as may appeare by ashort [sic] discourse on Gal. I.9, together with some breef notes on AB. Copps recantation sermon (as 'twere) preached at Burford, Sept. 23, 1651 / by John Tickell ... ; this may serve for a key to familisme ('till another) opening to most (if not all) their chambers of imagery ; also to vindicate the true Gospell, God, and scripture-purity and answer severall weighty questions concerning the mystical union.
titleStmt.author: Tickell, John, d. 1694.

titleStmt.title: The bottomles pit smoaking in familisme as may appeare by ashort [sic] discourse on Gal. I.9, together with some breef notes on AB. Copps recantation sermon (as 'twere) preached at Burford, Sept. 23, 1651 / by John Tickell ... ; this may serve for a key to familisme ('till another) opening to most (if not all) their chambers of imagery ; also to vindicate the true Gospell, God, and scripture-purity and answer severall weighty questions concerning the mystical union.
titleStmt.author: Tickell, John, d. 1694.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at Oxford by L.L. for Alice Curteyne ...,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: torn and stained, with print show-through and loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
